snippet: The attack in Samarra, north of Baghdad, left 35 people wounded and five assailants dead in a two-hour battle with police.
abstract: Gunmen wearing suicide belts raid local government building in Samarra, Iraq, killing four government employees and three police officers and wounding at least 35 people; four gunmen die and fifth blows himself up inside building.
lead_paragraph: The attack in Samarra, north of Baghdad, left 35 people wounded and five assailants dead in a two-hour battle with police.

headline.main: Gunmen Kill 7 in Attack on Iraqi Government Building
headline.print_headline: Iraq: 12 Dead in Attack on Government Offices
